manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neck Gaiters LENBOKEN Sun Protection Face Shield Multi Use Bandanas Face Mask Reusable.The Neck Gaiters can be worn in many ways.Balaclava Face Mask for motorcycling,skiing, hiking,snowboarding, fishing, running, climbing, tactical training and other outdoor activities. In order to ensure the high performance of our products, we have chosen a kind of fabric with better performance in breathability, durability, and comfort. This fabric can effectively protect your neck and face from dust or cold wind.

Kindly Note BREATHABLE FACE MASK, BANDANA, NECK SCARF is our reputation.Our own gear in order to tailor high quality Neck gaiters . We offer quality gear, reliability and most importantly to provide quality gear for all outdoorsmen.we can constantly innovate and make products that enhance your outdoor experience.

A gaiter — frequently referred to as a buff, and also a fancy name for a neck warmer Good air permeability Soft and skin friendly Suitable for most kind of helmet, like motorcycle helmet, ski helmet, baseball helmet etc. Stretchy and not tight Lightweight and Sun protection Good idea for outdoor sports, can be combined with many forms of dressing, and also a great gift Dust proof and sand control Will not wrinkle or deformation after machine wash, quick drying, can be reused for many times

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you need to add Color this is the perfect Gaiter to have. They are light weight, stretchable and holds color after wash several times. Love the color selections available. They are PERFECT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great colors. Perfect fit I use every day at work protection from sun and wind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used for ATV riding in Mexico
reviews.reviewText: These are great for not wanting dirt in your face. But they are hard to breathe in with a helmet. They kept going into my mouth when I would inhale which is a bummer. But they did the job and kept the dirt out of my mouth and off my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size just right for Med head
reviews.reviewText: The inclusion of spandex helps make the feel of this fabric softer, springier, less shiny than some of the 100% polyester ones I previously bought. No seams a plus. I mostly use these to keep my hair out of my face and fits great for my medium sized head. I also wear them as a face mask when riding my mountain bike to keep bugs/debris out of my mouth. Air passes easily through the material and doesn't restrict flow when breathing hard. Get outside and experience some nature today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking with just the right amount of stretch. I just them as winter wear over the back of my head and ears. You might not think so, but they are amazingly warm. Makes winter golf downright tolerable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I originally purchased these for sun protection on my neck. I found they also work great for cool windy days to keep my neck warm. Love the fabric for both sunny and windy days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels like Nylon - wish it was softer cotton feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comforable and beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: I need these as gaiters cuz my neck is sensitive to cold. It can't be too thick like those you wear for skiing, otherwise it'll be too hot when I'm sleeping. So these thin gaiters do the job! And they are eye-catching! By wearing them I'm like 10 years younger, and look like some artiest, hah! High recommended!
